Package ojc.bain.synapse

Contains classes that implement synapse models.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Clopath2010SynapseCollection
    Implementation of the model described by Clopath et al.: "Connectivity reflects coding: a model of voltage-based STDP with homeostasis", (2010).
    Clopath2010SynapseConfiguration
    Configuration object for Clopath2010SynapseCollection.
    FixedSynapseCollection
    Implements synapses with a fixed efficacy (weight).
    Graupner2012SimplifiedSynapseCollection
    A simplified implementation of the model described by Graupner, M., Brunel, N.: Calcium-Based Plasticity Model Explains Sensitivity of Synaptic Changes to Spike Pattern, Rate, and Dendritic Location.
    Graupner2012SimplifiedSynapseConfiguration
    Configuration object for Graupner2012SynapseCollection.
    Graupner2012SynapseCollection
    Implementation of the model described by Graupner, M., Brunel, N.: Calcium-Based Plasticity Model Explains Sensitivity of Synaptic Changes to Spike Pattern, Rate, and Dendritic Location.
    Graupner2012SynapseConfiguration
    Configuration object for Graupner2012SynapseCollection.
    Pfister2006SynapseCollection
    Implementation of the model described by Pfister, J.-P., Gerstner, W.: Triplets of Spikes in a Model of Spike Timing-Dependent Plasticity.
    Pfister2006SynapseConfiguration
    Configuration object for Pfister2006SynapseCollection.

Package ojc.bain.synapse Description

Contains classes that implement synapse models. All synapse models extend from SynapseCollection
